title: Mon Post Show (05-17-21)
itunes:title: Mon Post Show (05-17-21)
description:
Bobby kicks off the show with our rap intro. Bobby plays a voicemail from a listener asking about an update on Lunchbox’s Altima. Lunchbox reveals the total they quoted him on to fix it. Amy also talks about the B-Team sending her a bird camera for her feeder. Amy also talks about her in-laws staying at her house in town. Bobby also addresses why we haven’t started playing Morgan Wallen’s music yet and what our bosses are telling us about when we can again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby kicks off the show with our rap intro. Bobby plays a voicemail from a listener asking about an update on Lunchbox’s Altima. Lunchbox reveals the total they quoted him on to fix it. Amy also talks about the B-Team sending her a bird camera for her feeder. Amy also talks about her in-laws staying at her house in town. Bobby also addresses why we haven’t started playing Morgan Wallen’s music yet and what our bosses are telling us about when we can again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
